description: The malfunction or breakdown of hardware, software, or other technical components within a system, often leading to disruptions or loss of functionality.
The failure or disruption of facilities or infrastructure that support the operation of digital systems, such as power supply, cooling systems, or backup systems.
The harm or destruction of physical components, devices, or infrastructure, which may impact the functionality and security of digital systems.
Interference caused by electromagnetic radiation that disrupts the normal operation of electronic devices or communication systems, posing a threat to cyberspace security.
